page.title: 10STOCKPORT DAFFODIL MARATHON
page.content: A popular event in{Stockport}is the { Daffodil Marathon.}This is organised by the{Leisure Services Division of { Stockport MBC.}First started in 1982,it attracts over 1500 runners. A year ago a 6.5 mile Minithon for under 18's was introduced and 860 children competed in 1985. The marathon is held on the second Sunday in April. The start and finish is in{Woodbank Park.}This is no easy run as the river valleys of the Goyt,Tame and Mersey make a hilly course. Crowds line the streets.Traffic is disrupted. People run for charity. Some take it very seriously. The great thing is that the event enjoys the support of the local community by sponsors,spectators and copetitors. Long may it continue!
